Vindictus.[EVENT] Summer Sun Dice Event:
]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/3953157/8c4d47b34de1e1136c12c62f2799fbbf7cfe6947.jpg[/img]

Event Period: 7/9/2024 (Tue) - 7/23/2024 (Tue)

 

Complete Region Raid, Special Dungeon, and Royal Army battles during the event to earn Summer Sun Dice x1.
[list][*]Dice are earned per Account.[/*][*]You can obtain up to 20 dice in a week. (Max 40 over the course of the event.)[/*][/list]

Vindictus.[Pre-Notice] Fix of Departure Counts Res:
Mercenaries,


Please note that there is an issue where certain Battle Departure Counts are being reset earlier than planned.

With the fix of the Departure count reset schedule, the Departure counts for the Battles listed below will be reset during the maintenance on 7/2 (Tue).

[b]Battle List[/b][list]
[*] Battle of Rocheste
[*] Clan of Darkness
[*] Spearhead of Paradise Lost
[*] Under the Pale Moon
[*] Ladaton Bridge
[*] Royal Castle Dungeon
[*] Gates of Hell
[*] The Dark, Dank Sewers
[*] The Giant
[*] Into the Abyss
[*] Burning Temple
[*] The Evil One
[*] The One Who Protects the Altar
[*] 
[/list
Vindictus.[CMTY] GM Coin S4: A Perfectly Competiti:
]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/3953157/4e9645164054c7fc33264f3ca073006339cd0e48.png[/img]

Event Period: 6/25/2024 (Tue) after weekly maintenance - 7/23/2024 (Tue) before weekly maintenance

Mercenaries can now make or receive requests for equipment crafting in each Expertise!

Take a screenshot while visiting a player receiving requests and write a review, or create a marketing slogan to attract more requests.


[b]Reward Information:[/b][list]
[*] If more than 70 screenshots are entered through our Discord event channel, [i]#perfect-market[/i], then all players will receive 15 GM Coins during the 7/23/2024 (Tue) weekly maintenance.
[*] If there are not enough participants, only those who participated will receive a coupon code.
[*] You may not participate multiple times.
[/list]
